title: Recall Notification Report 102-2015 (Sausage Products)
summary: WASHINGTON, July 16, 2015 The Sausage Factory Inc., a Carson City, Nev. establishment, is recalling approximately 5,960 pounds of sausage products due to misbranding, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. Although produced under USDA inspection, some packages may...
